info.title: PaySpace
info.description: Our powerful solution allows you to access your employee data in order to utilize in your business environment. All supported endpoints in one place and ready to be integrated into your solution.

get.description: Retrieves a list of active employee biographical details as of the today's date and based on the specified company-id.

parameters.name: company-id
parameters.description: {{company-id}} The Company Id

parameters.name: $orderby
parameters.description: (string) - Specifies the order in which items are returned

parameters.name: $top
parameters.description: (integer($int32)) - Limits the number of items returned from a collection

parameters.name: $skip
parameters.description: (integer($int32)) - Excludes the specified number of items of the queried collection from the result

parameters.name: $count
parameters.description: (true/false) - Return total count in response

parameters.name: $filter
parameters.description: Optional - Filter by field eg. "EmployeeNumber eq 'Emp01'"

parameters.name: $select
parameters.description: Optional (string) - Returns only the fields specified

parameters.name: CustomAuthHeader
parameters.description: Bearer token value (without the keyword Bearer)

parameters.name: CustomEnvironmentHeader
parameters.description: Variable that is either api (for PROD) or apistaging (for STAGING)

post.description: Create a single employee record for the specified EmployeeNumber.

parameters.name: company-id
parameters.description: {{company-id}} The Company Id

parameters.name: CustomAuthHeader
parameters.description: Bearer token value (without the keyword Bearer)

parameters.name: CustomEnvironmentHeader
parameters.description: Variable that is either api (for PROD) or apistaging (for STAGING)

get.summary: Get a collection of employees as of an effective date
get.description: Retrieves a list of active employee biographical details as of the specified effective date and based on the specified company-id.

parameters.name: company-id
parameters.description: {{company-id}} The Company Id

parameters.name: effectivedate
parameters.description: Effective date formatted in YYYY-MM-DD. eg. 2022-01-15

parameters.name: $orderby
parameters.description: (string) - Specifies the order in which items are returned

parameters.name: $top
parameters.description: (integer($int32)) - Limits the number of items returned from a collection

parameters.name: $skip
parameters.description: (integer($int32)) - Excludes the specified number of items of the queried collection from the result

parameters.name: $count
parameters.description: (true/false) - Return total count in response

parameters.name: $filter
parameters.description: - Filter by field eg. "EmployeeNumber eq 'Emp01'"

parameters.name: CustomAuthHeader
parameters.description: Bearer token value (without the keyword Bearer)

parameters.name: CustomEnvironmentHeader
parameters.description: Variable that is either api (for PROD) or apistaging (for STAGING)
